Title: Justice League: The New Frontier
Writer: Stan Berkowitz, Darwyn Cooke (additional material), Darwyn Cooke (graphic novel), Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Jerry Siegel (character created by: Superman), Joe Shuster (character created by: Superman), William Moulton Marston (character created by: Wonder Woman)
Actors: David Boreanaz, Miguel Ferrer, Neil Patrick Harris, John Heard
Plot: In the 1950s, a new generation of superheroes must join forces with the community's active veterans and a hostile US government to fight a menace to Earth.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 nominations.
